name: Mr.Cubert & The Boxy Conundrum
description:
Mr.Cubert & The Boxy Conundrum is a very small and short Platformer, endless-runner type on rails inspired by Flappy Bird and other such games. It took me a little over a year to make and learn how to develop this game starting from the very basics. It all first started out as a little game for my son to play when he was on my phone. So then I wanted to try to make it a little bit more harder and annoying and then, bada-boom here we are!  PERMISSIONS:
  • THIS GAME IS FOR PERSONAL & COMMERCIAL PURPOSES ONLY!
  • YOU MAY MODIFY THIS GAME 
  • YOU MAY NOT SELL OR REDISTRIBUTE THIS GAME! 
*Thanks for playing & downloading my game, don't forget to rate and comment and if your feeling generous enough feel free to leave a donation because anything helps!*
